diseases.name: malaria
diseases.symptoms: Fever, chills, sweats, headaches, nausea and vomiting, and body aches.
diseases.prevention: Use mosquito nets, apply insect repellent, and take anti-malarial medication if prescribed.

diseases.name: dengue
diseases.symptoms: High fever, severe headache, pain behind the eyes, joint and muscle pain, and a skin rash.
diseases.prevention: Eliminate mosquito breeding sites by removing stagnant water, and use mosquito repellent.

diseases.name: covid-19
diseases.symptoms: Fever, cough, tiredness, and loss of taste or smell. Serious symptoms include difficulty breathing.
diseases.prevention: Vaccination, wearing masks in crowded areas, and frequent hand washing.
